alias: 廃村少女［弐］　～陰り誘う秘姫の匣～
data.description:
One summer night, a violent storm battered the remote seaside village of Shinju Town. The disaster left deep scars on both the land and the hearts of its inhabitants, and before long the town was abandoned—its people vanishing, leaving behind a trail of unfulfilled yearnings and buried secrets…

Seven years later, on another summer day, Kawakura Reiichi—a university student—steps alone into the ruined remains of Shinju Town.

It all begins with his late grandfather’s final wish—a brief return home to decide the fate of the house where they once lived together.

Then, amid the lingering aromas and familiar vistas of a town that feels like another world, Reiichi meets a mysterious girl who calls herself "Shinju."

[i]"Reiichi… you are destined to be the sacrifice that fulfills the shrine maiden and the box."[/i]

Reiichi and four girls find themselves trapped in Shinju Town, isolated from the outside world.

Among them is Mishio Haruna, a childhood friend who bears a striking resemblance to Shinju; Niinuma Suzu, another childhood friend from the old days of Shinju Town—a little sister in spirit; Ryugatou Yachiyo, a girl on a quest to uncover the town’s legendary treasure; and Tsuzuki Nanase, a university peer drawn into Reiichi’s troubled orbit. Then, in a chilling command, Shinju orders Reiichi to rape and impregnate the imprisoned girls.

Though Reiichi and his companions band together in search of an escape, an insidious, erotic force—bound up with dark ties to their past—lures them into a vortex of debauchery, as the town fills with seductive moans.

Two girls mirror each other. 
Fragmented memories and a promise once made. 
The true identity of the deity worshipped in the town. 
The dormant desires and sins slumbering in the forsaken village.

Facing hidden truths, can Reiichi and the others ever return to the world they once knew?

What lies concealed in the mysterious box—promised hope or the desire that seductively leads to ruin?

[Translated and edited from the official site: https://www.escude.co.jp/product/haison2/world.html]
tags: Protagonist's Childhood Friend as a Heroine
data.title: Haison Shoujo [Ni] ~Kageri Sasou Hime no Hako~

alias: さくらの雲＊スカアレットの恋
data.description:
"1920 ...?"

Tsukasa Kazami, a young man who lives in 2020, sees himself travel back in time 100 years ago after sitting under a cherry tree.

-- Tokyo, the Imperial Capital. Full of hopes for the future, it's a brilliant romantic city where the flowers of culture are in full bloom.

"Elementary, Tsukasa. The last thing left is always the truth."

A mysterious British woman who runs a detective agency alone in the imperial capital.
Under her lack of money, Tsukasa is involved in numerous incidents ...?

"--Now, let's find out the answer".

Which era will awaken his true potential, Reiwa or Taisho? The curtain of this retro mystery among cherry blossoms lifts!
tags: Female Protagonist for a Short Time

links.name: jawiki
links.url: https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/さくらの雲*スカアレットの恋

data.title: 樱色之云＊绯色之恋（さくらの雲＊スカアレットの恋）

alias: Saya no Uta ~ The Song of Saya
data.description:
The story centers around Fuminori Sakisaka, a medical school student involved in a vehicle accident that claimed the lives of both his parents and left him with critical injuries. 
He was rescued by experimental brain surgery that coincidentally altered his perception of the world dramatically. 

Everything now seems to be composed of slimy intestines and gore to him. In addition, the rest of his senses: touch, hearing, smell, and taste, are also impaired, similar to his sight, further damaging his mental health.

Fuminori's desire to live dwindles, and one night, while still in the hospital, he contemplates suicide. However, a girl in a white dress named Saya appears before him. Compared to the horrible surroundings, she looks completely normal, if not downright gorgeous. Fuminori soon falls in love with Saya, and she becomes his raison d'être.

As time passes, Fuminori gets increasingly secluded from the rest of his normal life as he embarks on a mission to find a specific person Saya is looking for. Fuminori's friends and doctor get more concerned as he acts strangely over time. Nonetheless, they will soon cross paths, for better or worse...
data.title: Saya no Uta

alias: Futamata Ren'ai: Two Times the Trouble
data.description:
Talk about waking up on the wrong side of the bed! Our hero, Koga Nao, finds himself in a classic "morning after" scenario with a girl he barely knows.

"You're gonna own up to this... so... you'd better date me, got it?" demands Toiro Kirame, the girl he met at a mixer. Koga's pretty sure he was just playing Good Samaritan, but she's convinced they hooked up, and before he knows it, he's being strong-armed into "taking responsibility."

As if that wasn't enough, his long-time crush, Nobuta Yua, picks this moment to drop a bombshell: "I've decided to grace you with my presence as your girlfriend! Aren't you over the moon, Koga?"

Talk about being stuck between a rock and a hard place! After pining for Yua for ages, Koga can't exactly say no now, can he? And just like that, our protagonist makes his grand debut as an accidental two-timing scumbag.

Now he's juggling two girlfriends, watching his web of lies grow more tangled by the day. As he racks his brain for a way out, the relationships around him twist and turn. To make matters worse, folks around his girlfriends are getting suspicious, and the walls are closing in.

Will he sink deeper into this bottomless love swamp that's way beyond simple two-timing? Or can he somehow pull off a miracle and find a happy ending where nobody gets hurt?

Buckle up for a wild ride! This roller-coaster romantic comedy – packed with heart-racing thrills and stomach-churning suspense – proves that sometimes love is a battlefield, and Koga's fighting a war on two fronts!

[Translated from [url=http://www.getchu.com/soft.phtml?id=1162879]Getchu[/url]]
tags: Heroine with Pre-story Virginity Loss to the Protagonist
data.title: 恋爱成双
